probably happening is that the joystick driving command is still running while you are calling setControl from periodic, so both control requests conflict with each other.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOne way to solve this would be creating a Trigger for the required condition, then using whileTrue to schedule the necessary applyRequest command. This would properly use command requirements to avoid multiple places both trying to control the drivetrain at
